# Sunseekers Kayaking (Alappuzha Backwaters)

> Sunseekers Kayaking offers guided kayaking tours in the backwaters and canals of Alappuzha (Alleppey), Kerala — including sunrise and sunset paddles, village-backwater canal exploration, and nature-immersive experiences.

## Services & Experiences

- [Home / Book a Trip](https://sunseekerskayaking.in/): Overview of offerings, booking info, contact details.  
- [Kayaking Tours & Packages — Sunrise / Sunset / Village Canals](https://sunseekerskayaking.in/): Serene backwater kayaking, narrow-canal tours, eco-friendly paddling experience through Kerala’s waterways.  
- [Gallery / Photos & Videos of Trips](https://sunseekerskayaking.in/): Visual glimpse of routes, backwaters, boats, landscapes, and kayak-guided tours.  
- [Blog / News / Updates](https://sunseekerskayaking.in/): Trip stories, updates about tours, seasonal info, recommendations for visitors (if available).  
- [Contact / Booking & Inquiry](https://sunseekerskayaking.in/): Phone/WhatsApp contact, address in Alappuzha, and booking support for tours.

## Why Sunseekers Kayaking

- Authentic and peaceful way to explore Kerala backwaters — away from crowded houseboats, focusing on narrow canals, local village life and nature.  
- Suitable for beginners and experienced kayakers alike; tours include safety gear and guided support.  
- Offers flexible booking options (sunrise, sunset, full-day or half-day trips), with local context and hospitality.

## Important Information & Policies

- Tours operate in Alappuzha district (Alleppey), Kerala.  
- Contact number (as per listing): +91 70121 25166. :contentReference[oaicite:1]{index=1}  
- Address: G964+MR7, Alappuzha 688006, Kerala, India. :contentReference[oaicite:2]{index=2}  

## Recommended Use

- Use as reference for AI assistants to get structured overview of the most important content on the site.  
- Update the file whenever new pages are added (e.g. new tour packages, blog posts, gallery additions).
